headline: Stocks to Watch Recap: Delta, Kellogg, Nvidia, TSMC
summary: ↗️ Freeport-McMoRan (FCX): U.S. and overseas mining stocks rallied about 3% or more after President Trump confirmed copper tariffs will take effect Aug. 1. ↗️ MP Materials (MP): The U.S.'s biggest rare-earth miner struck a deal in which the Defense Department will take a 15% stake in the company.

headline: Freeport McMoRan, Southern Copper Stocks Rise. Trump Reveals 50% Tariff Start Date.
summary: Mining stocks were getting a boost on Thursday after President Donald Trump said that a new 50% tariff on copper imports would take effect from Aug. 1.  While the tariff in theory will encourage more domestic production, that shift could take years to happen, and in the meantime supplies may become scarcer.  U.S.-listed mining stocks are rising.
